title: Normals, Join?
body: Add for normals, or comment and ill add you. need to get use to this game again :)

replies.body: Chobi (as it says in my name), I could give some pointers if needed and just have fun really..
Thanks for the add Chobi. Hope to play with you soon ;-)
Have sent you a frnd req
sure but im  a bit bad atm{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
